entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 8 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near midnight then clearing. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023
